benchmark_details.name: English Indexical Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: This dataset evaluates LLM performance on coreference resolution with indexicals like I, you, here, and tomorrow, comprising 1,600 multiple-choice questions designed to test how LLMs interpret these indexical elements in various contexts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess LLMs' understanding of indexical elements in English and evaluate their performance across different contexts.

data.source: Curated dataset designed for evaluating indexical interpretation in context.
data.annotation: Generated by GPT-4o with evaluation for grammatical correctness and contextual accuracy.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the correct selections made in relation to the ground truth in the dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better LLM performance in interpreting indexical elements correctly across different contexts.
methodology.validation: Validation process included evaluating grammatical correctness and conformity to contextual prompts.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The dataset promotes gender neutrality by alternating between male and female names.
